00017 //GLOBALS
00018 pthread_mutex_t queue_mutex = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
00019 
00020 // Message Queue
00021 // ------------
00022 queue MessageQueue;
00023 
00024 
00025 // =======================================================================
00026 // =======================================================================
00027 
00028 
00029 /**
00030  * Initialize queue
00031  */
00032 void queuer_init(void) {
00033 
00034         MessageQueue.head = NULL;
00035         MessageQueue.tail = NULL;
00036 
00037 }// init
00038 
00039 
00040 /**
00041  * Queues a message in the communication queue
00042  */
00043 void queuer_queue(PhidgetManagerMessage *msg) {
00044 
00045         node *tmp=NULL;
00046 
00047         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG,"queuer_queue: BEGIN");
00048 
00049         pthread_mutex_lock( &queue_mutex );
00050 
00051                 tmp = (node *) malloc(sizeof(node));
00052                 tmp->msg = msg;
00053 
00054                 //perform the ''put'' operation {
00055                         //no next yet...
00056                         tmp->next=NULL;
00057 
00058                         //insert pointer to element first
00059                         if (MessageQueue.tail!=NULL)
00060                                 (MessageQueue.tail)->next=tmp;
00061 
00062                         // insert element
00063                         MessageQueue.tail = tmp;
00064 
00065                         //was the queue empty?
00066                         if (MessageQueue.head==NULL)
00067                                 MessageQueue.head=tmp;
00068                 //}
00069 
00070         pthread_mutex_unlock( &queue_mutex );
00071 
00072         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG,"queuer_queue: END");
00073 
00074 }//[/queuer_queue]
00075 
00076 
00077 /**
00078  * Retrieves the next message from the communication queue
00079  * Returns NULL if none.
00080  */
00081 PhidgetManagerMessage *queuer_dequeue(void) {
00082 
00083         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG,"queuer_dequeue: BEGIN");
00084 
00085         PhidgetManagerMessage *msg=NULL;
00086 
00087         pthread_mutex_lock( &queue_mutex );
00088 
00089                 // perform the ``get`` operation {
00090                 node *tmp = NULL;
00091                 tmp = MessageQueue.head;
00092                 if (tmp!=NULL) {
00093                         MessageQueue.head = MessageQueue.head->next;
00094                         msg = tmp->msg;
00095                         free(tmp);
00096                         doLog(LOG_DEBUG,"queuer_dequeue: MESSAGE PRESENT");
00097                 }
00098                 //}
00099 
00100         pthread_mutex_unlock( &queue_mutex );
00101 
00102         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG,"queuer_dequeue: END");
00103 
00104         return msg;
00105 }//[/queuer_dequeue]
00106 
00107 
00108 /**
00109  * Releases a message
00110  *  Performs the appropriate clean-up
00111  *
00112  *  This function is sort-of trivial but it decouples
00113  *  the client from the underlying server.
00114  *
00115  */
00116 void queuer_release(PhidgetManagerMessage *msg) {
00117 
00118         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG,"queuer_release");
00119 
00120         manager_destroy_message( msg );
00121 
00122 }//[/queuer_release]
